message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value, I'm asking for $18,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm very interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $8,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $14,000. This product offers significant value, and I'm confident you'll see a return on your investment.
I understand that the product has value, but $14,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.
